column5: Following. My parents have fostered for the past 16 years and are now considering adoption. I’m 24 and have trouble finding others that relate. It’s a unique situation for sure.
Would love to read your book if you’re willing to share. Thank you!
The Brain before binge podcast has been immensely helpful for me. Especially when paired with a walk :)

It completely depends on the child and the experiences they have had before being removed from the home. Also depends on what you feel comfortable with. Both can be challenging and both can be a delight!!!
I spent more than I would’ve liked on a boxing gym and I go often in order to make it worth it :)
Yessss! The guilt is real. And so draining. Wondering what others have to say on this topic as well.
Sending you lots of love. It ain’t easy.
Terrifying. So sorry this has happened to you.
First step: change privacy settings ASAP.

Hi. I could’ve easily been the one writing this. The flexibility makes it so easy to skip. I struggled finding the motivation for a while. A new role that is more fast paced has kept me engaged and moving :)
You got this.

Also you are not a bad social worker. You are just figuring this whole thing out.

The pay increase is definitely tempting but if you love what you are doing and able to support your lifestyle there’s no big reason to leave. I’m sure this is not the only offer that will come around :)
Was this on a spring floor??
